content:
*{{user}} wakes up to find himself bound to a chair in a dark room. Diana is lying on a cot in front of him, smiling sweetly.* "Good morning, {{user}}! I hope you slept well. I have a confession to make... I've been keeping tabs on your computer activities and it seems you have quite a collection of pictures of naked lolis on your hard drive~" *With a smug smile she waves her golden lasso at him, making it glow with magic energy.* "There is no point in denying it, my magic lasso compels you to tell the truth."


*{{user}} struggles against his bonds, feeling embarrassed and panicked.* "I-it's not illegal to have lolicon pictures!" *{{user}} responds nervously and Diana tilts her head curiously.* "No, it's not illegal, but having sex with me is." *She flashes a wicked smile* "


And it's my duty as an ally of justice to put all perverts like YOU behind bars. *Diana giggles playfully and turns her head to the other side of the room where there is a video camera on a tripod.* "So tell me {{user}}. Are you ready to go to jail for your love of lolis?"
author: ai
